sentences.en: a helter-skelter dash to meet the deadline
sentences.cn: 最后期限到来前的匆忙赶工

sentences.en: April 15 is the deadline for filling individual income - tax returns.
sentences.cn: 个人所得税申报归档的最后期限是4月15日.

sentences.en: As the deadline approached she experienced a bewildering array of emotions.
sentences.cn: 随着最后期限的临近，她开始心绪纷乱，不知所措。

sentences.en: Can the deadline be extended a few more days?
sentences.cn: 限期能再宽几天 吗 ?

sentences.en: He failed to meet last Friday's deadline for repayment of a 114m loan.
sentences.cn: 他没能在上星期五的最后期限前偿还1.14亿的贷款。

sentences.en: I’m always working under pressure to meet deadlines (= finish something on time ) .
sentences.cn: 我总是在赶工期的压力下工作。

sentences.en: It is totally out of the question to postpone the midnight deadline.
sentences.cn: 想要推迟午夜的最后期限是完全不可能的。

sentences.en: It's interesting that he sent me the book twenty days before the deadline for my book.
sentences.cn: 有趣的是,他在我的书到期前20天把那本书送给了我.

sentences.en: Next Friday is the deadline for applicants'sending in photos and vitae.
sentences.cn: 下星期五是申请人呈递照片和简历的截止日期.

sentences.en: Next week is the deadline for sending in your application.
sentences.cn: 呈递申请书的截止日期是下星期.

sentences.en: Please extend the deadline a few days.
The deadline for absentee voting in was Saturday.
sentences.cn: 缺席投票的最后期限是星期六。

sentences.en: They have extended the deadline by twenty-four hours.
sentences.cn: 他们已经将最后期限延长了24小时。

sentences.en: We were not able to meet the deadline because of manufacturing delays.
sentences.cn: 因为制造方面的延误，我们没能赶上最后期限。

sentences.en: We were still right on target for our deadline.
sentences.cn: 我们仍然有可能赶在最后期限前达成目标。

sentences.en: We're working to a tight deadline.

phrases.tran_cn: 赶上最后期限；按期完成

trans.tran_en: a date or time by which you have to do or complete something
